The user [[Tongue Tooth Sticky Acid|sprays yellow acidic paste]] on the ground, which can raise up to create a wall-like formation, capable of either damaging a target or providing effective coverage.

[[pt-br:Tiro de Muco Explosivo]]
[[ru:Выстрел Взрывной Слизи]]
[[pl:Bakueki Hōsha]]
